title: O'Sullivan beaten by Higgins at Masters in quarter-final featuring five consecutive centuries
description: World champion Ronnie O'Sullivan is beaten 6-3 by John Higgins in a remarkable Masters quarter-final.

title: 'You don't want your rivals at the same level' – Fernandes eager to keep Man Utd’s title edge
description: Bruno Fernandes thinks it would be "fun" for the fans if Manchester United could extend their lead in the title race when they face Liverpool on Sunday.

title: WhatsApp changes: Signal messaging platform stops working as downloads surge
description: Signal has been downloaded millions of times since WhatsApp unveiled new privacy terms last week.

title: Joanna Lumley 'shocked' at claims disabled workers unpaid
description: Sir Iain Duncan Smith and Joanna Lumley speak out about employees allegedly owed a total of £200,000.

title: Can supermarket security guards help with mask rules?
description: Supermarkets around the UK are stepping up enforcement of mask-wearing rules.

title: The Papers: Infection rate 'hope' - but care home cases rise
description: A mix of stories, many on the coronavirus pandemic, lead Friday's newspapers.

title: Scottish FA asks Championship clubs whether they want to continue playing or suspend season
description: Scottish FA chief executive Ian Maxwell has written to all 10 Championship clubs asking if they want to continue playing or suspend their league.

title: Ex-Masters champion Cabrera 'arrested in Brazil' over alleged domestic abuse
description: Mr Cabrera faces extradition to Argentina where he is alleged to have committed domestic abuse.

title: Police probes compromised after computer records deleted
description: A letter from police chiefs also says 213,000 records were lost - more than first thought.

title: Capitol riots: Police describe a 'medieval battle'
description: US police held back a mob for hours in a "barbaric" battle at the Capitol. Here are their stories.

title: UK snow: Polar bears enjoy Yorkshire's wintry weather
description: Bears Nobby, Hamish, Luka and Sisu are enjoying the snow which has fallen across the county.

title: 'We were texting back and forth, chuckling at this whole scenario' - Brees v Brady in NFL play-offs
description: Two future Hall of Fame quarterbacks meet in the NFL play-offs this weekend as the New Orleans Saints host the Tampa Bay Buccaneers in the pick of the divisional round.

title: Covid-19: Brazil virus already in UK ‘not variant of concern’, scientist says
description: A variant that is thought to be more infectious has not been found in the UK, scientist says.

title: Root hits unbeaten 168 as England dominate Sri Lanka
description: Captain Joe Root scores his first Test century since 2019 to help England build a substantial lead over Sri Lanka in the first Test in Galle.

title: Technical issue resolved after '150,000 police records lost'
description: The Home Office says it is working to "assess the impact" of the issue, which has been resolved.

title: Biden Twitter account 'starts from zero' with no Trump followers
description: Joe Biden's presidential Twitter account launches with no followers transferred from President Trump.

title: Judges reject Lockerbie bomber's appeal against conviction
description: The family of Abdelbaset al-Megrahi had launched the posthumous bid to overturn his conviction.

title: After three appearances and eight loans in 10 years, Chelsea's longest-serving player leaves
description: Lucas Piazon played - well, technically at least - under eight different Chelsea managers but he has now left the club for good.

title: In pictures: Winter scenes from around the UK
description: As temperatures drop, wintry weather has brought snow, frost and flooding to parts of the UK.

title: UK economy shrank by 2.6% in November as services suffered
description: Coronavirus restrictions in England affected services, with pubs and hairdressers badly hit.

title: Coronavirus: Student nurses 'at risk' without insurance on placement
description: Government has introduced scheme for third year students, but others still left unprotected.

title: Why Bez wants people to 'get buzzin' in lockdown'
description: Joe Wicks inspired the nation to get moving during the first lockdown, but there's a new character on the fitness scene.

title: Insurers must pay small firms for Covid lockdown losses
description: A Supreme Court ruling provides a lifeline for many firms that had business interruption insurance.

title: Why I’m backing resilient Liverpool to beat in-form Man Utd - Murphy analysis
description: Manchester United are in form and top of the table but Jurgen Klopp's Liverpool have a history of remarkable resilience, says MOTD pundit and ex-Red Danny Murphy.

title: Saleh set to join Jets and become NFL's first Muslim head coach
description: A deal is agreed in principle for Robert Saleh to join the New York Jets and become the first Muslim head coach in NFL history.

title: Brexit: 'Most difficult week I've had in this job in 20 years'
description: Some hauliers say they have faced long delays and fear things will get worse before they get better.

title: Sylvain Sylvain: New York Dolls guitarist dies aged 69
description: He helped kick-start punk and new wave, and was an influence on the Sex Pistols and Guns N' Roses.

title: North Korea: Kim Jong-un oversees huge military showcase
description: Planes, missiles and marching troops are on show as North Korean state media broadcasts a massive parade.

title: Labuschagne punishes India with century on day one of decisive Test
description: Marnus Labuschagne's century puts Australia on top after day one of the decisive fourth Test in Brisbane, as dropped catches cost India.

title: NYC bendy bus left drooping from overpass in Bronx
description: Several people are hurt as a bus plunges from an overpass in the Bronx on to an access road below.

title: Joe Biden unveils $1.9tn US economic relief package
description: The US president-elect says the nationwide vaccine rollout so far has been "a dismal failure".

title: North Korea unveils new submarine-launched missile
description: The show of military strength comes days before the inauguration of Joe Biden as US president.

title: Covid: Fake news 'causing UK South Asians to reject jab'
description: The NHS fears some communities are being targeted with misinformation, a leading doctor says.

title: Rules of origin: Why are Percy Pigs a headache for M&S?
description: Rules of origin are a key part of the UK's trade deal with the EU. What are they?

title: You Me At Six: Why rock stars don't need to drink
description: Drummer Dan Flint gave up booze during the first national lockdown - he tells us why.

title: Talia Dean: 'My back pain was misdiagnosed for 15 years - now I can't dance'
description: Singer Talia Dean was 18 when she first had symptoms of axial spondyloarthritis. It took 15 years to get a diagnosis.

title: Covid-19: 'One medic saw eight people die in a single shift'
description: A therapist who arranges free mental health help for NHS workers says many are at "breaking point".

title: Finding Alice: How Keeley Hawes drama offers 'authentic' image of grief
description: The actress stars in Finding Alice about a woman left floundering after her partner's sudden death.

title: Villarejo: The rise and fall of the Spanish state's secret fixer
description: An undercover policeman now facing trial amassed a hoard of Spanish state secrets.

title: Colourising historical photos of the civil rights movement
description: Jordan J Lloyd has added digital colour to black-and-white photos of Dr King and the civil rights movement.

title: Young, black and more likely to die in Brazil
description: A BBC investigation uncovers who is most at risk of lethal police violence in Brazil.

title: 'It kind of makes debt cool – and it's not'
description: Some MPs worry "buy now, pay later" services could be tempting online shoppers into overspending.

title: Johan 'N0tail' Sundstein: Inside the world's richest e-sports player's mansion
description: Johan "N0tail" Sundstein has earned more than $7.4m (£5.4m) in prize money to date.
